    a = 5
    b = 1

    while a > 0:
        b *= a
        a -= 1

    print b

    a = 5
    b = 1
    for i in range(a):
        b *= i

    print b

    a = 5
    b = 1
    for i in range(1, a):
        b *= i

    print b
